overview:
Michael Kenworthy is a member of the investment team at Revolution Growth, a Washington D.C.-based private equity firm that invests in and actively helps build disruptive, innovative, and significant consumer technology companies.

Prior to joining Revolution Growth, Michael was an Associate at Allen & Company and Goldman Sachs, where he focused on advisory assignments and growth equity investments across the technology, media, and telecom industries. During his time at Allen and Goldman, Michael worked closely with a wide-range of companies, including Activision Blizzard, Zynga, Facebook, Twitter, Groupon, Gilt Groupe, Time Warner, McGraw-Hill, the Cleveland Cavaliers, the Chicago Cubs, and the Minnesota Twins.

Michael received a BA in Economics from the University of Wisconsin-Madison and an MBA from Harvard Business School.
